channel.title: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username
channel.description: I'm making it so players can register in my moparclassic server. I understand all the columns in the pk_players table except for owner and owner_username. What should I set those too? Who's the player's owner? Thanks!

item.title: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

CodeForFame:

Make a PHP page or something that creates accounts.

nah

Or resolve the issue.
exactly!
Also, what the hell does it have to be with security?
Bad security is hell.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username

item.title: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“latifundio, post:9, topic:453171”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=556022.msg4070969#msg4070969 date=1344349644]
He’s not using a forum, so he can use whatever he wants as long as it’s unique.
[/quote]

https://github.com/Lothy/MoparClassic/issues/137 …so the only way to this is manually?

if it could be like moparisthebest want it, the database shouldn’t be that easy to be leaked?[/quote]Make a PHP page or something that creates accounts. Or resolve the issue.

Also, what the hell does it have to be with security?

Read full topic
item.source: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username

item.title: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

CodeForFame:

He’s not using a forum, so he can use whatever he wants as long as it’s unique.

https://github.com/Lothy/MoparClassic/issues/137 …so the only way to this is manually?

if it could be like moparisthebest want it, the database shouldn’t be that easy to be leaked?

Read full topic
item.source: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username

item.title: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“RylandAlmanza, post:6, topic:453171”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=556022.msg4070655#msg4070655 date=1344307483]
It should be a unique id. Most likely auto incremented.
[/quote]
There’s already a field (id) in the pk_players table that is auto-incremented, and there can’t be more than one auto-incremented field. The owner field isn’t unique either. What else could it be?[/quote]You can have multiple… Just Google it.

Hint: You’re using MyISAM.

[quote=“Ecko, post:7, topic:453171”][quote author=RylandAlmanza link=topic=556022.msg4070585#msg4070585 date=1344300829]

I’m making it so players can register in my moparclassic server. I understand all the columns in the pk_players table except for owner and owner_username. What should I set those to? Who’s the player’s owner? Thanks!

I believe the player’s owner is the forum account name in which the ingame account was created.

Thanks for your help!
That might make sense for owner_username, but the value of owner is supposed to be an integer. So what would I put for that? Also, I don’t have a forum for this server, nor do I want one, so if it really is supposed to be a forum username, I wouldn’t have anything to put in it. Is there a way I can set up moparclassic without a forum?
[/quote]
owner = id of forum user
owner_username = encode_username() function from rscd www (common.php or functions.php, can’t remember)[/quote]He’s not using a forum, so he can use whatever he wants as long as it’s unique.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username

item.title: MoparClassic Database Values for owner and owner_username
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“RylandAlmanza, post:3, topic:453171”][quote author=Wife Beater link=topic=556022.msg4070549#msg4070549 date=1344299404]

I’m making it so players can register in my moparclassic server. I understand all the columns in the pk_players table except for owner and owner_username. What should I set those to? Who’s the player’s owner? Thanks!

I believe the player’s owner is the forum account name in which the ingame account was created.
[/quote]
Thanks for your help!
That might make sense for owner_username, but the value of owner is supposed to be an integer. So what would I put for that? Also, I don’t have a forum for this server, nor do I want one, so if it really is supposed to be a forum username, I wouldn’t have anything to put in it. Is there a way I can set up moparclassic without a forum?[/quote]
owner = id of forum user
owner_username = encode_username() function from rscd www (common.php or functions.php, can’t remember)

Read full topic

item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

CodeForFame:

It should be a unique id. Most likely auto incremented.

There’s already a field (id) in the pk_players table that is auto-incremented, and there can’t be more than one auto-incremented field. The owner field isn’t unique either. What else could it be?

I’m making it so players can register in my moparclassic server. I understand all the columns in the pk_players table except for owner and owner_username. What should I set those to? Who’s the player’s owner? Thanks!
[/quote]

I believe the player’s owner is the forum account name in which the ingame account was created.[/quote]

Is there a way I can set up moparclassic without a forum?
